main.py¶

Created on : Tue Aug 22 17:02:55 2017 Author : Guus Rongen, HKV Lijn in Water Project : PR3594.10.00 Description :

class anduryl.ui.main.MainWindow[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

Main UI widget of Anduryl.

add_export_actions(resultsoverview)[source]¶

Method to add expert action when new results have been calculated. In the ‘export’ menu the result button is enabled, and export options for the new results are added.

Parameters

resultsoverview (ResultOverview class) – Object with the results for a calculated decision maker

closeEvent(event)[source]¶

Method called when application is closed. The method checks whether there are unsaved changes, and ask the user to save, discard or cancel.

dragEnterEvent(e)[source]¶

Method to accept a dragged file, based on the extension.

dropEvent(e)[source]¶

Function to open a project by drawin the file inside the UI.

end_profiling()[source]¶

End profiling the code performance, and write the results to a file.

exit()[source]¶

Method that passes to close event.

getIcon(iconname)[source]¶

Retrieve icon from data dir and set to GUI

Parameters

iconname (str) – File name of the icon

Returns

Qt object of icon

Return type

QtGui.QIcon

get_project_file()[source]¶

Opens a dialog to select a project file to open.

init_menubar()[source]¶

Constructs the menu bar.

init_ui()[source]¶

Construct UI, by splitting the main window and adding the different widgets with tables.

new_project()[source]¶

Opens a new projcet. Checks if results should be saved. All items, experts and results are removed.

ok_to_continue(title)[source]¶

Asks the user whether results should be saved, discarded or the action cancelled.

open_project(*args, fname=None)[source]¶

Method that loads project file and builds gui

remove_export_actions(dm_id)[source]¶

Method to remove the export actions from the menu after the results are deleted.

Parameters

dm_id (str) – ID of the decision maker to remove.

save_project()[source]¶

Save current project, checks if the file name is already known. If not, the save as function is called and the user is asked to pick a file.

save_project_as(fname=None)[source]¶

Asks the user for the file name to save the project to. If the file name is passed, the user is not asked the file and the project is saved directly.

Parameters

fname (str, optional) – File name, by default None

setCursorNormal()[source]¶

Changes cursor (back) to normal cursor.

setCursorWait()[source]¶

Changes cursor to waiting cursor.

start_profiling()[source]¶

Start profiling the code performance.

update_projectname(name=None)[source]¶

Updates window title after a project has been loaded

Parameters

name (str, optional) – Project name, by default None

class anduryl.ui.main.Signals(project, main)[source]¶

Bases: object

Signal class. Contains all signals that are called to update the GUI after changes.

selection_changes()[source]¶

Updates selection of array that is shown in table

update_color_range()[source]¶

Updates the bounds of the arrays and colormaps

update_gui()[source]¶

Updates: - Tables (refresh view) - Comboboxes

update_headers()[source]¶

Updates: - Tables (refresh view) - Comboboxes

update_ids()[source]¶

Updates the combobox id’s
